courseSectionInformation: Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated to a maximum of 2 hours for Masters students and 4 hours for Ph.D. students.
description: Discussions of current research and literature pertaining to disciplinary specializations within the Division of Nutritional Sciences. Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated to a maximum of 2 hours for Masters students and 4 hours for Ph.D. students.
label: Disciplinary Seminar
